<content type="html">;3.13。第 13 条：使用默认实现来最小化所需的特征方法 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#effective-rust" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quake 的闪电枪错误解释</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-15T05:07:40.902716Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc"/>; <author>; <name>;henning</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=henning</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/4gNYTqn3qRc" 框架边框="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quake-s-lightning-gun-bug-explained" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何在 40 小时内抓取 25 亿个网页（2012 年）</stitle>; <id>;https: //michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:07:40.903122Z</updated>; < link href="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/"/>; <author>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swyx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/wp-content /uploads/2012/08/quarter_billion_page_crawl_big_picture.png" style="width: 220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;作者使用 20 个 Amazon EC2 机器实例在不到 40 小时的时间内抓取了超过 2.5 亿个网页。他们想了解抓取一小部分 Web 所需的资源并描述他们的详细信息这篇文章中的项目。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本周 Rust 499</stitle>; <id>;https://this-week-in- rust.org/blog/2023/06/14/this-week-in-rust-499/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:07:40.903502Z</updated>; <link href="https: //this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2023/06/14/this-week-in-rust-499/"/>; <author>; <name>;unripe_syntax</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=unripe_syntax</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本周 Rust 是对 Rust 编程语言进展和社区的每周总结。它包括构建管道、回归、改进、RFC 和即将到来的 Rust 事件的更新。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-week-in-rust-499" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36337500" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;像变形金刚一样思考 (2021) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06981</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T09 :07:40.903880Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06981"/>; <author>; <name>;jbay808</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=jbay808</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv- logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;文章提出了一种用于转换器编码器的计算模型，称为受限访问序列处理语言 (RASP)，它将转换器编码器的基本组件映射为简单的原语。它演示了如何使用 RASP 为 Transformer 学习的任务编写解决方案，以及如何训练 Transformer 以模仿 RASP 解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thinking-like-transformers-2021-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36311871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;ESP32-C3 无线探险：物联网综合指南 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T04:07:40.904587Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files /documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </ author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是 Espressif Systems 关于 ESP32-C3 微控制器 SoC 的一本书的摘要，这是一种用于连接设备的经济高效的解决方案。本书涵盖与物联网开发相关的各种主题，包括物联网项目开发、硬件设计、无线通信和量产优化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#esp32-c3-wireless-adventure-a-comprehensive-guide-to-iot-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;生物声学：寻找其他物种的声音</stitle>; <id>;https://worldsensorium.com/bioacoustics-finding-the-其他物种的声音/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:07:40.904949Z</updated>; <link href="https://worldsensorium.com/bioacoustics-finding-the-voices- of-other-species/"/>; <author>; <name>;dnetesn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dnetesn</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://worldsensorium.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nalls-2306.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了数字生物声学领域，该领域使用技术来聆听和分析超出人类听觉范围的植物和动物的声音。这项技术使科学家能够更深入地了解不同的生物及其交流，并有可能彻底改变保护工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bioacoustics-finding-the-voices-of-other-species" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;了解过去，拿起一本旧杂志</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/magazine/old-magazines.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T10:07:40.905304Z</updated>; <link href="https:/ /www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/magazine/old-magazines.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/18/magazine/18mag-lor/18mag-lor -articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了作者对旧杂志的迷恋，以及它们如何充当时间机器，让我们得以一窥过去，挑战我们对历史的先入之见。作者回顾了他们在 1980 年代阅读杂志的个人经历，并强调了从头到尾阅读它们以真正了解当时的文化和背景的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-understand-the-past-pick-up-an-old-magazine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312232" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FANN：200 行 Rust 中的向量搜索</stitle>; <id>;https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in -200-lines-of-rust/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:07:40.905674Z</更新>; <link href="https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in -200-lines-of-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://fennel.ai/blog/content/images/2023/06/data-src-image-050a1e4d-0798-44ef-b0e4-22974a071d5f.png" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：181px；” />;<br />;由于 AI/ML 采用的进展，矢量数据库正变得越来越普遍。本文解释了矢量数据库的工作原理，并演示了如何使用 Rust 代码构建一个简单的矢量搜索库。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fann-vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338365" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用核心 Vim 动作快速移动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with -vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:07:40.906034Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;停泊</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www. barbarianmeetscoding.com/images/vim-motions-word.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：109px；" />;<br />;Vim 中的动作是允许快速和精确移动光标的命令。有不同类型的动作，例如单词动作和类似搜索的动作，每种动作都适合不同的目的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moving-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;11 年托管 SaaS 的经验教训</stitle>; <id>;https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting -a-saas</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T06:07:40.906388Z</更新>; <link href="https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting- a-saas"/>; <author>; <name>;ghiculescu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ghiculescu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3。 amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb51ff6cc-04f6-43a5-be58-fa15ae72214c_1560x500.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;本文反映了作者运行 Web 应用程序 11 年的经验，讨论了部署、托管和基础架构管理方面的挑战和经验教训。它涵盖了作者从使用 Heroku 到迁移到 Digital Ocean 和最终迁移到 AWS 的旅程，强调了一路上的困难和错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lessons-learned-from-11-years-of-hosting-a-saas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Instant Pot 失败是因为它是一个好产品</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/ 2023/06/instant-pot-bankrupt-private-equity/674414/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T11:22:40.906847Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theatlantic. com/technology/archive/2023/06/instant-pot-bankrupt-private-equity/674414/"/>; <author>; <name>;tim_sw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=tim_sw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/FTpvuyUe77VVP0vT9Hf3As2CnU0=/0x0:4800x2700/960x540/media/img/ mt/2023/06/instapot_2/original.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Instant Pot 是一种流行的厨房用具，它是一款成功的产品，它向许多美国人介绍了家庭压力烹饪的概念。然而，其母公司 Instant Brands 面临财务困难并因供应链问题和向其他家用小工具类别扩张的有限成功而申请破产。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-instant-pot-failed-because-it-was-a-good-product" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么核电站建设成本如此之高？</stitle>; <id>;https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-工厂建设成本/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:07:40.907279Z</更新>; <link href="https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-construction-costs/ "/>; <author>; <name>;scythe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scythe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://progress.institute/wp-content/uploads/image-12.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：162px；" />;<br />;随着技术的进步，核电站建设成本一直在增加。高成本主要是由于人工费用、监管增加以及需要能够在受损工厂中运行的冷却系统等因素造成的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-does-nuclear-power-plant-construction-cost-so-much" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SETI 科学家制定月球监听站计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti-scientists -to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T01:07:40.907702Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.supercluster.com /editorial/seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station/"/>; <author>; <name>;yk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=yk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了在月球背面建立一个专门的 SETI 天文台的可能性。研究人员正在努力为这项任务定义技术规范，这将为正式的 A 阶段研究提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36334912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU——比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量</stitle>; <id>;https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia +H100+和+A100+GPUs+-+比较+可用+容量+at+GPU+云+供应商</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:07:40.908252Z</更新>; <link href="https ://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+available+capacity+at+GPU+cloud+providers"/>; <author>; <name>;tikkun</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tikkun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU - 比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量 - LLM Utils <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-h100-and-a100-gpus-comparing-available-capacity-at-gpu-cloud-providers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333321" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;减少摩擦</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.ceejbot.com/posts/reduce-friction/</id >; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:07:40.908674Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.ceejbot.com/posts/reduce-friction/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.ceejbot. com/images/honeycomb-build-trace.png" style="width: 220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了减少摩擦在工程组织中的重要性以及领导者可能对在这方面投入资源的阻力。它强调了减少摩擦的好处并提供了如何做的建议它有效。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reduce-friction" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=36306337" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学家在土卫二上发现磷</stitle>; <id>;https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-14T23:07:40.909393Z</updated>; <link href="https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus"/>; <作者>; <名称>;伪</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tlpnetwork .com/images/logo-main.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;科学家们在土星的卫星土卫二上发现了生命必需元素磷。这一发现基于美国宇航局卡西尼任务收集的数据，表明土卫二可能具有支持生命存在的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36333762" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;构建自己开源的平台</stitle>; <id>;https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed</id>; <updated >;2023-06-15T09:07:40.909825Z</updated>; <link href="https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11< /名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://zed.dev/ img/post/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed.png" style="width: 220px; height: 98px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了关于代码的高效对话的重要性，以及开放公共编码通道以扩展此功能的计划。目标是让人们可以收听、观看和聊天与团队一起编写代码，并最终开源平台。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-platform-that-open-sources-itself" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337828" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;程序员对 CPU 缓存的误解（2018 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://software .rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:07:40.910292Z</更新>; <link href="https ://software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/"/>; <author>; <name>;whack</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=whack</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://softwarerajivprab.files.wordpress.com/2019/07/cache.png"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 259px;" />;<br />;作为一名在 Intel 和 Sun 从事高速缓存工作五年的计算机工程师，我对高速缓存一致性了解了一两件事。这是最难理解的概念之一回到大学学习 - 但一旦你真正理解它，它会让你非常欣赏​​系统设计原则。你...... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#myths-programmers-believe-about -cpu-caches-2018" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333034" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于 John Wick 的缓慢生产力< /stitle>; <id>;https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T01:07:40.910652Z</更新>; < link href="https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick/"/>; <author>; <name>;lawgimenez</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=lawgimenez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://calnewport.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/wick-640 -px.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 113px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了 Cal Newport 于 2007 年推出的“Study Hacks”博客，该博客获得了大量读者，涵盖技术、生产力和深度生活等话题世界。在 2022 年，Cal 还推出了一个名为 TheDeepLife.com 的新门户，用于提供与深度生命运动相关的其他内容。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-the-slow-productivity-of -john-wick" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335104" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1906 年旧金山地震的目击者描述</ stitle>; <id>;https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T06:07:40.911024Z</updated>; <link href="https:// publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity"/>; <author>; <name>;samclemens</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samclemens</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://publicdomainreview.org/static/pdr-circles-66b0b7b42092975f0d5502ab646d9fa8.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;文章描述了当局如何在 1906 年旧金山地震期间使用炸药作为灭火技术。尽管效果有限，他们继续使用炸药炸毁城市的大片区域，包括范尼斯大道上一英里半的维多利亚式房屋。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eyewitness-accounts-of-the-1906-san-francisco-earthquake" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德国希望将非法药物的质量控制合法化</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.spiegel.de/politik/deutschland/arzneimittel-reform-karl-lauterbach-will-drugchecking-bundesweit-einfuehren-a-b642b609-9149-47bc-a013-11476d54e96f</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T11 :21:40.911379Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.spiegel.de/politik/deutschland/arzneimittel-reform-karl-lauterbach-will-drugchecking-bundesweit-einfuehren-a-b642b609-9149- 47bc-a013-11476d54e96f"/>; <author>; <name>;tfourb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tfourb</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://cdn.prod.www.spiegel.de/images/c59c85b2-cf85-4bb7-9e98-ddd552b17087_w948_r1.778_fpx44.87_fpy50.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;德国的吸毒者将很快能够在全国范围内测试他们的药物成分。联邦卫生部长 Karl Lauterbach (SPD) 宣布计划引入所谓的药物检查，允许联邦各州建立必要的条件。Lauterbach 旨在从《麻醉品法》中取消目前禁止毒品检查的规定，让各联邦州独立确定框架。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#germany -wants-to-legalize-quality-control-of-illegal-drugs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338870 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;GPT-4 的原生 JSON 输出</stitle>; <id>;https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 14T20:07:40.911729Z</updated>; <link href="https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4"/>; <author>; <name>;yonom</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yonom</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image /fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fbcf4d45c-57cd-4dca-b2d3-2f173af25df0_1600x1024 .png " style="宽度: 220px; height: 141px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在集成 LLM（大型语言模型）中使用函数调用来生成 JSON 等结构化数据。这一新功能简化了流程，并允许从 GPT 调用中获得更可靠的 JSON 响应. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#native-json-output-from-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人在 2021 年发现了加州大学伯克利分校的骨架</stitle>; <id>;https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/ uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T03:07:40.912093Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/"/>; <author>; <name>;yawnxyz</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yawnxyz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/content/images /size/w256h256/format/jpeg/2022/09/The-Berkeley-Scanner_Icon_Color-1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;承包商两年前在加州大学伯克利分校的一座废弃建筑中发现了骨骼残骸，并向加州大学的一位主管报告，但主管没有通知警方。由于缺乏行动，工人们感到沮丧今年 1 月向加州大学警察局报告了遗体，使此案进入公众视野。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-uc-berkeley-skeleton- 2021 年" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335581" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我在 21 小时内启动了 Linux 293k 次</stitle >; <id>;https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T14:07:40.912444Z</更新>; <link href="https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;而且只用了 21 个小时。Linux 6.4 有一个错误，它在启动时挂起，但可能只有千分之一的启动（如果出于某种原因使用 Intel 硬件，则更少）。令人惊讶对我来说，没有人注意到这一点，但我确实注意到了，因为我们使用 libguestfs 的 nbdkit 测试是随机的…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-booted-linux-293k-times-in -21 小时" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325986" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我是一名急诊医生。以下是我的工作方式我已经在使用 ChatGPT 来帮助治疗患者</stitle>; <id>;https://inflethealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to- help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:07:40.912795Z</更新>; <link href="https://inflecthealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor -here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6"/>; <author>; <name>;SLHamlet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=SLHamlet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1053/1*zVkc5iNVMQQIApQS_OKAAA.jpeg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;AI，特别是 ChatGPT，有可能改变医疗保健，但它的直接影响在于较小的应用程序。例如，急诊医生一直在使用 ChatGPT 与患者及其家人进行有效沟通，提供明确的解释并减轻他们的顾虑。这改善了医患关系，并使医疗专业人员能够专注于提供优质护理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#im-an-er-doctor -heres-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36332999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Credal.ai (YC W23) – 企业 AI 的数据安全</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525</id>; <updated >;2023-06-14T16:07:40.913156Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525"/>; <作者>; <name>;r_thambapillai</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=r_thambapillai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Credal.ai 提供聊天 UI 和 API，为使用的公司实施数据安全措施语言模型及其公司数据。它们解决了与数据控制、可见性和访问控制相关的安全和隐私障碍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-credal-ai-yc-w23-data-safety-for-enterprise-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;卫报禁止所有赌博广告</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/ jun/15/guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:10:40.913510Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/society /2023/jun/15/guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising"/>; <author>; <name>;CaptainZapp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CaptainZapp</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/5c6f546284549fb740c0194a3383e8eef64d0321/0_150_4500_2700/master/4500.jpg?width=465&quality=85&dpr =1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;《卫报》宣布在全球范围内禁止赌博广告，理由是担心赌博的成瘾性及其对个人财务和心理健康的负面影响。该禁令将适用于该媒体集团在全球的所有在线和印刷媒体。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338784" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
